properties.markdownProperty:
In order to translate the desired archetypes, look for the languages YAML files in the `i18n` directory, It may be a file or a directory with multiple file for each language. Check how to create an archetype repository section to learn more about language configuration file and translations files.
Once opened/created the translation file (`*.yml` or `*.yaml`), introduce the entry (code.string: "translation") in the desired section. Take in mind that 'string' is the original text written in the XML file, but lowercased and spaces replaced by underscore. If you text contain `:` character, you can wrap you text using '' (Example: `':proteus-name'`).
These are the codes for each type of archetype data translation:
- Archetype classes - `archetype.class` - Property names - `archetype.prop_name` - Property categories - `archetype.prop_category` (not `archetype.category`!!) - Property tooltips - `archetype.tooltip` - enumProperty choices - `archetype.enum_choices`
